title: I'm FREEEEEEEE
body: 1000s of hooks, snares, shields, heals, and wards later I have finally escaped Bronze and made it into Silver 5. Finally. Shout out to Naut and Taric. Feelsgood. Now I can go screw around in norms and learn new champs.

replies.body: time to get into challenger series with that Taric dont let anyone tell you that you can't
Lol. All I'm aiming for is gold.
I am disappointed in you.  You claim to play Taric yet don't aim for Diamond?
its his nauty side talking

Damn so true.  Also what is it with Taric players also being Naut players?  I know of at least a couple of us including me.  Heck I have almost as many points on Naut as Taric, only like a 10k difference or something and yet the champs are so different in so many ways.
they arent so different, they both get tanky, like to auto attack every now and then, decent cc, and scale with a bit of ap

That is hardly a good comparison.  That is like saying Darius and Karma are similar because they both aa on occasion and can heal on hitting enemies with abilities.

Nautilus has mobility, multiple CC spells, and lots of AOE damage.  Taric has heals, no mobility, one stun, and a damage negation ult for his team.

The only similarities are they are both tanky like any number of bot lane supports, they both aa as part of their passives although Naut wants to hit lots of different people, and they both have shields.

I mean I can see it for people who played old Taric, he was a lot more similar to Nautilus with excessive AOE damage, point and click CC, and way more damage than anyone expects.  New Taric just feels very different from Naut and I am surprised by how many Taric players I know who have Naut as their second most played champion.
i was just saying the seem to have similar playstyles from what ive seen.  i wasnt trying to say they were the same champ
Yeah I know, sorry if I came off as harsh, been having debates with a couple different people and that always gets me fired up when it comes to discussion ;P
i understand, gameplay is a harsh place
Bit of *ap*?
Isn't he made of bronze?
wasnt he hunting for gold st the bottom of the ocean?
Underrated.
NO GO CHALLENGER NOW you have one week to get to challenger and 1v1 Qtpie or i will find you. and steal your underwear
Diamond would be awesome. And you have no idea how much I'd like to support Qt.

Silver-Gold is still elo hell :O

It's hella rewarding to get gold V though
My secret to climbing, im currently in gold 3: http://imgur.com/ozzCVDw Who needs skill when you can dunk everything.

People are still stuck in silver/bronze in 2017? gosh, thank god that im not playing this game anymore

> [{quoted}](name=Mischief Maker,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4F5zkUs,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-25T22:21:32.435+0000)
>
> People are still stuck in silver/bronze in 2017? gosh, thank god that im not playing this game anymore

That doesn't even make sense. Some people aren't that good at the game, so they play in Bronze and Silver. The fact that there are bad players will never change (though the bad players might become better, others may become worse, or new players will fill in the hole). Why does that even make you thankful you're not playing?

Not to mention some people just don't care too much about ranked and play promos just to see where they land. I was like that at beginning of S6 until I decided I wanted that sweet, sweet silver border.
Not to mention that no matter how good everyone is there always have to be people in bronze/silver as it's more of a percentage of people that are in any given tier/division.

"In a game where people climb its rankings by making others fall down its rankings, some people are at the bottom of the rankings? WTF IS THIS!?"

Literally you.
